recipes.name: Instant-pot Lentil Stew
ingredients: 1 lb? beef chunks or stew meet
instructions: Set instant pot to sauté and add olive oil
add carrots, then onion. sauté for 2-3 minutes (can sauté at the same time as browning the beef)
Add beef chunks and brown on all sides
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds
Pressure cook on high for 12-13 minutes
Quick release pressure after time is up

recipes.name: Instant-pot Creamy Sausage Pasta
ingredients: 1 box Noodles (elbows or shells work well)
1-3 cups water (enough to just barely cover the noodles)
1 jar Pasta Sauce (enough to cover the top layer of the noodles)
instructions: Set instant pot to sauté and add olive oil
Add diced onion and sauté for 2-3 minutes (can sauté at the same time as browning the sausage)
Add ground sausage and cook until browned, breaking up with a spoon
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds
Add 1 cup water and scrape the bottom of the pot to deglaze
Add noodles.  Add more water if needed to just barely cover the noodles
Add pasta sauce and italian seasoning.  Do not stir!  Let the pasta sauce sit on top of the noodles
Pressure cook on high for half the cook time recommended on the noodle box (usually 3 minutes)
Quick release pressure after time is up
Stir in heavy cream and top with parmesan cheese
